name: Lewd Puzzle [18+]
description:
Lewd Puzzle [18+] is a collectible card game with visual novel elements

Welcome to Lewd Puzzle [18+], an exciting game for adults that will take you to the depths of space. In this game, you will play as a space explorer who has crashed and landed on a research station where you will meet four defenseless girls.

These beautiful and sexy girls need your help in collecting the lost access cards to continue their journey. In Lewd Puzzle you will have an incredible quest to collect all the access cards, but don't think it will be easy. You have to put these cards together in any way possible to help these beautiful girls.

And when you help each of them, they will be happy to reward you with warm pleasant company and a warm deep welcome. Lewd Puzzle [18+] is a game that is worth every second spent with it. The game provides high-quality graphics and responsive controls that will make your game unforgettable. Use your skills and abilities to help these girls and get the reward you deserve. Enjoy Lewd Puzzle [18+] and play it with pleasure!

Features:
  • A Multitude of Sexy Situations
  • Collecting objects and solving puzzles
  • High-quality graphics
  • Fast-paced and intuitive gameplay
  • Ability to play with one hand ;-)
